item.title: 👍Joe Kendo - Washington State Labor Council, AFL-CIO
item.description: Joe Kendo signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington State Labor Council, AFL-CIO.

item.description: Jared Ross signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent South Sound Building & Construction Trades Council.

item.description: Erin Frasier signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington State Building & Construction Trades Council. They are a registered lobbyist.
